Title: Build Your Golden Dataset in Minutes
introduction: Today, we are introducing a new feature called Datasets. With Datasets, you can effortlessly save and export log data for various purposes, such as fine-tuning, synthetic data generation, and evaluation. Simply click the 'Create Dataset' button on the Logs page and adjust the filters as needed.

New.description: Added full-text search, allowing users to search through system prompts, user prompts, and responses.
You can now open logs with function calls in the playground.
Added fuzzy search for filter options.
Added function calls support; you can now call functions in the playground.
Added image upload code to playground code viewer.

Improved.description: Improved data export feature; you can now export unlimited logs asynchronously and download them via email.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where user could not selecte multiple items in the filter dropdown.
Fixed a bug where the user's applied filter was not reflected in auto-refetching.
